casebody.data:
STATE OF MAINE

Penobscot, ss. Supreme Judicial Court Law Term, June, 1939. June E. Estabrook vs. Ford Motor Company. Thaxter, J.

This is a companion case to Curtis G. Estabrook v. Ford Motor Company decided this day. As the issue in each case is identical, the entry will be the same.

Exceptions overruled.
